products: Solventless Cannabis Concentrates (Hash, Rosin, Bubble Hash)

website_info.summary: Emerald Sun Manufacturing, LLC is a family-owned cannabis hashery and pioneer of California's sungrown cannabis supply chain. They produce a variety of premium solventless cannabis concentrates and flower products.
website_info.infomration_about_the_team: Emerald Sun Manufacturing, LLC is led by a team of executives including President Sandy Marks, Chief Financial Officer Jeffrey Sarembock, and other family members such as Basil Haymann, Brett Schlesinger, Dean Schlesinger, and Gary Breen.
